content:
Work Practices Simulator

  • Few exist, primarily oriented to individual action (e.g, Flight/Driving Simulators)

  • CGs are a fast growing computing user population (mostly young people)

  • CGs driven by technology advances, especially graphics, removable storage, etc.

  • Should we consider R&D opportunities in riding this socio-technology wave?
